Description: Blue glazed composition shabti with painted detail: a dark-blue striated curled lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced eyes, a blue collar and parallel hands in relief with black bracelets and holding two black hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs from which the name has been omitted; the feet are represented separately and with the toes marked; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket and a yoke with two pendular nw-pots.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
